Elements.Name: ringFormatter
Description: Enable this to reduce the number of zeroes for the ring counter.

Elements.Name: homingReticle
Description: Enable this to display the homing reticle from Sonic Forces.

Elements.Name: windowTitle
Description: Enable this to display the Sonic Forces icon and name on the title bar.

Elements.Name: boostText
Description: Enable this to display the 'BOOST' text under the boost gauge - depending on lighting conditions, it can be hard to see.

Elements.Name: buttonType
Description: Select the type of button prompts to show in the game.

Elements.Name: difficultyType
Description: Choose how the rings behave based on the difficulty settings from Sonic Forces.

Elements.Name: alwaysActiveReticle
Description: Enable this to make the homing reticle active at all times, just like Sonic Forces.

Elements.Name: disk\bb3.cpk
Description: Choose what game you want the menu sounds to be from.

Elements.Name: trickSounds
Description: Choose how you want the unused trick sounds to behave.

Elements.Name: homingSound
Description: Enable this to use the homing lock-on sound from Sonic Forces.
